title: Drawing, "The Death of Archimedes", ca. 1820
medium: Pen and ink, brush and sepia wash over graphite on cream laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Soldier puts his left hand upon head of old man, raising his sword with other. Archimedes kneels on floor of portico, working with compass.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "The Death of Archimedes", ca. 1820.
ca. 1820. Pen and ink, brush and sepia wash over graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2467.
